transcript:
Customer: Jhute jhute wade the unke.
Sun ke jiya tujhke.
Hellow.
Executive: Hellow.
Customer: Hellow ha ji sir.
Executive: Ha Shivam ji kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya hai sir.
Executive: Ha mai ye bol raha tha ki service ke regarding jo issue tha usi ke regarding maine phone kiya tha to maine video meeting me kuch sara resolve kara diya tha na aapka?
Customer: Ha thoda sa ye point aisa ki jo maine photos vagera jo extra product bola tha aapne add kar diya ki nahi jaise maine aapko jo screenshot bheja tha aapke whatsapp pe.
Customer: Ha kiye the sir aur kar dunga ek do aur.
Executive: Koi baat nahi aur ye marble fountain vagera ka aapne kiya tha?
Customer: Ha inko karunga bas.
Executive: Kyuki sir agar marble fountain me aap deal karte hain thik hai to usko aap marble fountain ko add kar dijiyega thik hai kyuki add kar denge to vaha se jyada benefit aapko vaha pe mil jayega 100% thik hai na?
Executive: Aur isme abhi koi buylead vagera conduction kiye ki nahi sir?
Customer: Abhi to nahi ki sir abhi aayi nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi ek bhi nahi aayi hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Bas sir abhi thode time pehle se jab se maine video meeting ke baad se to aapko call aayi thi sir ek do matlab ye buylead aayi thi abhi sir ek Shivvers and Sai Asmita Infra ye to inse baat hui hai kya aapki Shivvers se?
Customer: Kon se sir?
Executive: Shivvers Shivvers karke ek buyer hai.
Customer: Shivvers ha inse maine baat ki thi sir maine inse baat to dekh ke 14 tak hum bata denge.
Executive: Bata denge?
Executive: Achha to kya aapka requirement tha sir matlab Shivam ji?
Executive: Matlab ye Shivvers statue me tha ya fir kis me?
Customer: Lead din me ek hi aa rahi hai ya to aa hi nahi rahi.
Executive: Ha?
Executive: Hellow.
Customer: Matlab itni nahi aa rahi ab Jaipur ki aayi hai marble Durga ye maine consume hi nahi kari.
Executive: Ha thik hai aapne ek Shiva statue ka aaya hai Shivasa Dadar and Nagar Haveli me.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ek piece me aaya hai stone marble metal 2 feet ka hai buyer jo buyer detail field kiya hai.
Executive: Ye isme stone marble metal 2 feet yaha pe add kiya to isme deal hota hai ki nahi sir aapka?
Customer: 2 foot me are.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Hota hai sir par mile to sahi sahi.
Executive: Ek bar 2 feet wala mai aapko ek second line pe rahiye mai screenshot bhejta hu.
Executive: Ye kuch time pehle aaya hua tha isko aap check kariye mai line pe hu.
Customer: Ye sir brass me hai sir.
Executive: Brass me hai?
Customer: Aur metal me bhi chahiye.
Executive: Ye apna marble aur metal me bhi chahiye inko to matlab kya ye kam aayega?
Customer: Ha inko stone marble metal sab.
Executive: Ha yaha pe dekhiye buyer detail yaha pe field kiya hua hai uske regarding yaha pe mention hai thik hai jo bhi detail hai to ho sakta hai ki uske regarding.
Executive: Genuine bhi ho agar mai baat karu to ha to ye chiz ho sakti hai sir ab Ushanath Sapre me ek aaya hua hai uske baad fir Shivling bhi aaya hua hai.
Customer: Thik sir maine yaha pe to mai dekhta hu matlab Shivling.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Isko ek bar dekho sir isko dekh ke Shivling ne isko conduction karo baki ek mai kam karta hu Polyserin Radhakrishna statue vagera ka jo aapko buylead aa raha hai.
Customer: Lead bachi hui hai bas.
Executive: Achha ek second rukiye mai dekh leta hu aapke pass three lead bachi hui hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm chaliye to isko agar agar possibilities hogi to isko shortlist kar lijiye kal kar lijiyega thik hai ya fir kal ka jo aapko buylead bonus milega vo to aapko milega hi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ab yahi soch raha hu sir mai koi badhiya si lead aa jaye to mai us pe kar du.
Executive: Badhiya si lead aayegi sir aise ruk jaiye mai check karta hu sara chiz isme kara diya hu koi issue nahi hai thik hai buylead vagera me koi issue nahi aane dunga sir thik hai jo bhi maine yaha pe mention kiya tha vo maine sara chiz yaha pe.
Executive: Kara diya hai thik hai isme koi dikkat nahi hoga usi ke regarding mai phone kiya hu kyuki mai ek bar dekh lete hai kya hai kaise yaha pe chize hai thik hai to vaha pe insert karke us chizo ko mai yaha pe adjust kar dunga aur kal se aapko jo hai ki buylead vagera jo hai whatsapp pe mai share karna start kar dunga thik hai?
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Ha aur mai sir is concern ko close kar deta hu madam ke end se thik hai to aapko jo mail jayega na us pe positive response dijiyega aur satisfaction me positive satisfaction me de denge uske baad good response kuch bhi mention kar dijiyega thik hai abhi mai sir concern ko close kara raha hu thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants good quality buyleads.

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive provided details of available buyleads.

- Executive assured no issues with buyleads.

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive closed the concern from their end.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide positive feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, statues, marble, metal
